zotero_url.description: Self-link url of the item in the Zotero database (by default protected if you are no logged in)

creators.description: Creators of the item. Generally, they are divided into 2 types : authors, contributors and editors

type.description: Type of the item. (todo : a list of all zotero itemTypes)

url.description: Url of the item, if specified in the bibliographical record.

language.description: Language in which the document is written/spoken.

website_title.description: Title of the item's website (if specified)

website_type.description: Type of the website (todo : check which are they)

DOI.description: Digital Object Identifier of the item

pages.description: Begining and ending pages of the item in the parent publication.

library_catalog.description: Catalog from which the record is taken
